parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.26

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns index of the unit in cargo. 0,1,2... or -1 if not in cargo.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''getCargoIndex''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[moveInCargo]] heli;
[[hint]] [[str]] (heli [[getCargoIndex]] [[player]]);</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[moveInCargo]], [[assignAsCargoIndex]], [[emptyPositions]]
</value></part></template></root>
